data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Conle, Oskar V., Hennemann, Frank H., Ramírez-Mora, Manuel A., Quiróz, John A. (2009): Studies on neotropical Phasmatodea VIII: Revision of the genus Decidia Stål, 1875 with the description of a new species from Colombia (Phasmatodea: Pseudophasmatidae: Pseudophasmatinae: Anisomorphini). Zootaxa 2089: 33-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187440
